title: Past Simple or Past Perfect - 1
instructions: Complete the sentences with the verbs. Use B1past simpleB2 or B1past perfectB2.

remarks: Corr: went. This is where the story starts, nothing had happened before this.
Corr: had closed. It had happened before I went into the office.
Corr: came. It happened after everthing, so we don't need past perf., just past simple.

remarks: Corr: got. It's past simple because it happened first.
